promotion-header: Embark on the path to a happy life.
promotion-sub-header: Meet someone who understands your struggles.

promotion-elements.text: We work exclusively with specialists certified by professional associations. Additionally, we apply our own verification system.

promotion-elements.text-header: Only specialists with positive client and patient reviews
promotion-elements.text: Our clients and patients have regular opportunities to rate our specialists. We maintain cooperation only with those who receive the highest ratings.

animated-text.subText: Are waiting for you in our service
